Constructor Detail

Map

public Map(int level)
Constructor used for starting a map without player data.

Parameters:
level - An integer indicating which level to load.

Map

public Map(int level,
           Player player)
Constructor used for starting a map with player data.

Parameters:
level - An integer indicating which level to load.
player - A player object that contains all the saved data.

Map

public Map(int level,
           Player player,
           java.lang.String mapFile,
           java.lang.String dirFrom,
           int newX,
           int newY)
Constructor used for switching between maps in a level.

Parameters:
level - An integer indicating which level to load.
player - A player object that contains all the saved data.
mapFile - A string containing the file of the new map to load.
dirFrom - A string indicating the direction that the player came from.
newX - An integer indicating the new x coordinate of the map.
newY - An integer indicating the new y coordinate of the map.
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Act - do whatever the EnemeyWeapon wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
